g.font-family: "ヒラギノ角ゴ Pro W3", "Hiragino Kaku Gothic Pro", Osaka, "メイリオ", Meiryo, "ＭＳ Ｐゴシック", "MS PGothic"

text.font-family: "ヒラギノ角ゴ Pro W3", "Hiragino Kaku Gothic Pro", Osaka, "メイリオ", Meiryo, "ＭＳ Ｐゴシック", "MS PGothic"
text.tspan: In the vast genre of sports games, none are as fun
or accessible as Wii Sports and it's expansion Wii
Sports Resort. Both games feature motion-controlled
minigames based on real-life actvities such as Bowling,
Golf, Tennis, Gliding, Waveboarding, and many more.
Wii Sports and Wii Sports Resort sold a combined 116
